name: Flap Jumper
description:
Help your penguine to swing and fly across the sky !

Swing through the spheres to get points. Keep the momentum and try not to fall in the clouds !

◉ Collect coins or get gold medals to unlock more characters.

How far can you make it ? :)

- HOW TO PLAY -

◉ Tap to attach rope

◉ Swing and gain speed

◉ Tap to detach and fly

Have fun !
